alert.note: Alert for Christian; Douglas; Stone; Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 4:55PM CDT until April 15 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Webster County in southwestern Missouri... Western Douglas County in southwestern Missouri... Christian County in southwestern Missouri... Northeastern Stone County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 454 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Highlandville, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ozark... Ava... Seymour... Sparta... Highlandville... Spokane... Oldfield... Elkhead... Chestnutridge... Bruner... Selmore... Keltner... Christian Center... Ponce de Leon... Garrison... Rome... Chadwick... Goodhope... Dogwood... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
